question: Lalji Tandon, who passed away recently, was serving as the Governor of which state?
explanation:
The Governor of the state of Madhya Pradesh Lalji Tandon has recently passed away at the age of 85.
Lalji Tandon has played an active role in politics for nearly five decades. He had served in the Uttar Pradesh Legislative Council for two terms, as an MLA in the Uttar Pradesh Legislative Assembly for three terms, as an MP in the 15th Lok Sabha and Governor of Bihar and Madhya Pradesh.
